sourcesContent:
<template>
    <b-modal :id="idmodal" :title="title" no-close-on-backdrop @shown="focus" @hide="status($event)">
        <slot name="question"></slot>
        <b-form>

            <label for="input">{{label}}</label>
            <b-form-input v-if="isInput()" ref="input" id="input" :type="type" :value="choice" @input="onchangemodel()" v-model="choice"></b-form-input>
            <b-form-radio-group v-if="type=='radio'" id="input" :options="options" :value="choice" @input="onchangemodel()" v-model="choice"></b-form-radio-group>
            <b-form-select v-if="type=='select'" id="input" :options="options" :value="choice" @input="onchangemodel()" v-model="choice"></b-form-select>
            <b-form-timepicker v-if="type=='timepicker'" id="input" :value="choice" @input="onchangemodel()" v-model="choice"></b-form-timepicker>
            <b-form-spinbutton v-if="type=='spinbutton'" id="input" :value="choice" @input="onchangemodel()" v-model="choice"></b-form-spinbutton>
            <b-form-checkbox-group v-if="type=='checkbox'" id="input" :options="options" :value="choice" @input="onchangemodel()" v-model="choice"></b-form-checkbox-group>
            <b-form-textarea v-if="type=='textarea'" id="input" :value="choice" @input="onchangemodel()" v-model="choice" rows="3" max-rows="6"></b-form-textarea>

        </b-form>
    </b-modal>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'InputModal',

    props: {
        idmodal: {            // recebe o id da janela modal para poder ser usada com o v-b-modal.<seu_id>
            type: String,
            require: true
        },
        show: {               // Mostra/Oculta a janela
            type: Boolean,
            default() {
                return false
            }},
        title: String,        // Título da janela
        label: String,        // Legenda do campo
        type: String,         // Tipo do campo
        min: Number,          // Valor mínimo
        max: Number,          // Valor máximo
        step: Number,         // Intervalo
        placeholder: String,  // Texto no corpo
        options: Array,       // Lista de opções
        // buttons: Array,    // Lista de botões
        defaultbutton: Number // Foco padrão do botão
    },

    data() {
        return {
            showmodal: this.show,
            choice: null, // sua escolha
            inputs: [
                'text',
                'number',
                'email',
                'password',
                'search',
                'url',
                'tel',
                'date',
                'time',
                'range',
                'color'
            ]
        }
    },

    watch: {
        show() {
            this.showmodal = !this.showmodal
        }
    },

    methods: {
        onchangemodel() {
            this.$emit('input', this.choice )
        },

        focus() {
            if (this.isInput()) this.$refs.input.focus()
        },

        isInput() {
            return this.inputs.indexOf(this.type)>-1
        },

        status(evt) {
            console.log('InputModel::status:', (evt.type==='hide') ? false : true)
            this.$emit('inputmodel', {event: evt, data: this.choice})
        },

        InputHide(evt) {
            evt.preventDefault()
            console.log('inputModel::InputHide:hit')
            console.log('Voce clicou em: ', evt.trigger)
            // this.$emit({option: this.choice, button: evt.trigger})
        }
    }
}
</script>
